maple: f:=proc(n) if n mod 2 = 0 then n/2 else 3*n+1; fi; end; g:=proc(n) local i,t1; t1:=[n]; for i from 1 to 120 do t1:=[op(t1),f(t1[nops(t1)])]; od; t1; end; g(3);
